Package de.uplanet.lucy.server.odata.connector.api.v1

Interface IConnectorFileAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnectorFileAdapter, Office365OneDriveFileAdapter
    public interface IConnectorFileAdapter
    Interface for custom file field adapter implementations.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • createFileDescriptors

        java.util.List<de.uplanet.lucy.server.util.IVHFileAdapterDescriptor> createFileDescriptors​(IConnectorRecord p_record,
                                                                                           java.lang.String p_strDgGuid,
                                                                                           java.lang.String p_strFieldGuid,
                                                                                           java.util.TimeZone p_tz)
        Provides file descriptor instances for all files belonging to a given record and file field. Usually, this loads the files from the target system and converts the metadata to file descriptors.
        Parameters:
        p_record - The record.
        p_strDgGuid - The datagroup GUID.
        p_strFieldGuid - The file field GUID.
        p_tz - The timezone.
        Returns:
        A list of file descriptor instances.

      • itemExists

        boolean itemExists​(IConnectorRecord p_record)
        Returns true, if a given file exists in the target system.
        Parameters:
        p_record - A record of field GUIDs and field values.
        Returns:
        True, if a given file exists in the target system.

      • createFiles

        IConnectorRecord createFiles​(IConnectorRecord p_record,
                             java.util.List<de.uplanet.lucy.server.file.action.IOperationFile> p_operationFiles)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Create new files in the target system.
        Parameters:
        p_record - A record of field GUIDs and field values.
        p_operationFiles - A list of file operations to execute in the target system.
        Returns:
        A map representing a record of field GUIDs and its updated field values.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If operation fails.

      • updateFiles

        IConnectorRecord updateFiles​(IConnectorRecord p_record,
                             java.util.List<de.uplanet.lucy.server.file.action.IOperationFile> p_newFiles,
                             java.util.List<de.uplanet.lucy.server.file.action.IOperationFile> p_replacedFiles,
                             java.util.List<de.uplanet.lucy.server.file.action.IOperationFile> p_deletedFiles)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Update files in the target system.
        Parameters:
        p_record - A record of field GUIDs and field values.
        p_newFiles - A list of create file operations to execute in the target system.
        p_replacedFiles - A list of replace file operations to execute in the target system.
        p_deletedFiles - A list of delete file operations to execute in the target system.
        Returns:
        A map representing a record of field GUIDs and its field values.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If operation fails.
